name: zig-wasm-monorepo
description: WebAssembly wrappers for Zig standard library modules

scripts.copy:wasm: for pkg in crypto hash compress base64 math; do cp zig-out/packages/$pkg/dist/$pkg.wasm packages/$pkg/dist/ 2>/dev/null || true; done
scripts.build: pnpm build:zig && pnpm build:ts && pnpm copy:wasm
